snippet: The new physics prize from Yuri Milner, the Russian tech investment magnate, throws a new light on how we might correct some of the perverse priorities of capitalism.
abstract: The new physics prize from Yuri Milner, the Russian tech investment magnate, throws a new light on how we might correct some of the perverse priorities of capitalism.

headline.main: What Other Professions Deserve $3 Million Prizes?
